name: Gold Gadget
desc: When this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 Machine-Type monster from your hand. If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 "Gadget" monster from your Deck, except "Gold Gadget". You can only use 1 "Gold Gadget" effect per turn, and only once that turn.

ocg.pack: Yu-Gi-Oh! The Dark Side of Dimensions Movie Pack

tcg.pack: Yu-Gi-Oh! The Dark Side of Dimensions Movie Pack
